summary: The "vision of Europe" encapsulates the aspirational framework guiding the European Union's legal and regulatory architecture. It reflects the collective ambition of EU member states to foster unity, peace, and prosperity through collaborative governance. This concept underpins various treaties and directives, shaping policies that promote economic integration, social cohesion, and environmental sustainability. The vision serves as a normative guide, influencing legislative initiatives and regulatory measures aimed at enhancing the European construction. By articulating shared values and objectives, the "vision of Europe" is pivotal in ensuring that EU actions resonate with the principles of democracy and human rights, reinforcing the foundational ethos of the Union.
